definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: By comparison, Dicos to enter the threshold is much more flexible.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，德克士的進入門檻則靈活得多。

sentences.english: His work has received relatively little attention from academic critics.
sentences.chinese: 而相比較而言，學院派評論家很少關注他。

sentences.english: The principle of non bis in idem are more in accord with the reality of China.
sentences.chinese: 比較而言，一事不再理原則更符合我國的實際。

sentences.english: In comparison, the Monkey King is a lone ranger.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，孫悟空是一個孤膽英雄。

sentences.english: We were good children, relatively speaking.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，我們還算是好孩子。

sentences.english: That compares with an annualized return of about 10% for a typical agreed-on deal.
sentences.chinese: 比較而言，一般商定交易的年化收益率在10%左右。

sentences.english: By comparison, Alec was the least ambitious man she had ever met.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，艾裏克是她見到的最沒有雄心壯志的人。

sentences.english: Comparatively speaking, China's central and western urban-rural gap is even more prominent issues.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，我國中西部城鄉差距拉大問題更爲突出。

sentences.english: Compared to Kendall' s W, intraclass correlation coefficients have a wide scope of application.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，組內相關係數檢驗的應用前景更廣闊。

sentences.english: In comparison, Google's share was merely around 16 percent.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，谷歌的份額只佔到約16%。

sentences.english: So try your best to have a happy Memorial Day weekend, relatively speaking.
sentences.chinese: 比較而言，還是盡力享受一個快樂週末吧。

sentences.english: China's soccer team, by contrast, is a perennial disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 相比較而言，中國國足卻叫中國人連年失望。
